oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Women on porch at French Legation
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of three women in white dresses sitting on porch. The woman on the right is Elise Croft. The woman in the middle appears to be reading a newspaper. "March 1913, French Legation, F. st. con 15th Vedado-" is written on the page.

While living in Havana, the Croft family socialized with wealthy Americans and foreign dignitaries from across the globe. They lived in Vedado, a neighborhood which housed a number of legations, or foreign embassies.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Americans--Cuba--History; Embassies
Porches; Dresses; Newspapers
